entry.value: INSERT INTO T_STUDENTS (FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, GENDER, GRADE, EMAIL, ROLL_NO) VALUES (:FIRST_NAME, :LAST_NAME, :GENDER, :GRADE, :EMAIL, :ROLL_NO)
SELECT * FROM T_STUDENTS ORDER BY STUDENT_ID DESC
UPDATE T_STUDENTS SET FIRST_NAME = :FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME = :LAST_NAME, GENDER=:GENDER, GRADE = :GRADE, EMAIL = :EMAIL, ROLL_NO = :ROLL_NO WHERE STUDENT_ID = :STUDENT_ID
INSERT INTO T_VACCINATION_DRIVES (VACCINE_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, AVAILABLE_DOSES, GRADE_ELIGIBILITY) VALUES (:VACCINE_NAME, :START_DATE, :END_DATE, :AVAILABLE_DOSES, :GRADE_ELIGIBILITY)
SELECT DRIVE_ID, VACCINE_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, AVAILABLE_DOSES, GRADE_ELIGIBILITY, UPDATE_TS FROM T_VACCINATION_DRIVES ORDER BY DRIVE_ID DESC
SELECT DRIVE_ID, VACCINE_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, AVAILABLE_DOSES, GRADE_ELIGIBILITY, UPDATE_TS FROM T_VACCINATION_DRIVES WHERE DRIVE_ID = :DRIVE_ID

UPDATE T_VACCINATION_DRIVES SET VACCINE_NAME = :VACCINE_NAME, START_DATE = :START_DATE, END_DATE = :END_DATE, AVAILABLE_DOSES = :AVAILABLE_DOSES, GRADE_ELIGIBILITY = :GRADE_ELIGIBILITY, UPDATE_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE DRIVE_ID = :DRIVE_ID
INSERT INTO T_STUDENT_VACCINATION_RECORDS (STUDENT_ID, DRIVE_ID, VACCINATION_DATE, DOSE_NUMBER, STATUS) VALUES (:STUDENT_ID, :DRIVE_ID, :VACCINATION_DATE, :DOSE_NUMBER, :STATUS)
SELECT * FROM T_STUDENT_VACCINATION_RECORDS WHERE STUDENT_ID = :STUDENT_ID ORDER BY UPDATE_TS DESC
UPDATE T_STUDENT_VACCINATION_RECORDS SET DRIVE_ID = :DRIVE_ID, VACCINATION_DATE = :VACCINATION_DATE, DOSE_NUMBER = :DOSE_NUMBER, STATUS = :STATUS WHERE RECORD_ID = :RECORD_ID
